consultant.q1: How effectively did you address the client's needs this week?
consultant.q2: How well did you collaborate with the client to achieve project goals this week?
consultant.q3: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the level of client engagement this week?
consultant.q4: How would you rate the client's understanding of project requirements this week?
consultant.q5: How successful were your client presentations or meetings this week?

software_developer.q1: How satisfied are you with the code quality achieved this week?
software_developer.q2: How effectively did you handle software bugs or issues this week?
software_developer.q3: On a scale of 1 to 5, how confident are you in the scalability of the code developed this week?
software_developer.q4: How well did you adhere to coding standards and best practices this week?
software_developer.q5: How successful were your code reviews or pair programming sessions this week?

intern.q1: How well did you contribute to the team's tasks or projects this week?
intern.q2: How satisfied are you with the level of mentorship or guidance received this week?
intern.q3: On a scale of 1 to 5, how confident are you in applying what you've learned to real-world projects this week?
intern.q4: How effectively did you communicate with team members or supervisors this week?
intern.q5: How successful were your learning experiences or challenges overcome this week?

common.q1: How well did the team collaborate to achieve project goals this week?
common.q2: How satisfied are you with the overall team dynamics and communication this week?
common.q3: On a scale of 1 to 5, how confident are you in the project's progress and direction this week?
common.q4: How effectively did the team address any challenges or obstacles encountered this week?
common.q5: How successful were the team's efforts in meeting project milestones or objectives this week?
